ing: 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "It can go either way, spiked or non-alcoholic... you end up with a fluffy cloud in your punch bowl. Best of all, it's made last minute. Quick, easy, FABULOUS! I get asked to bring it to every party I go to. If desired, stir in rum to taste."
ins: Pour fruit punch into a large punch bowl. Stir in grenadine and lemon-lime soda. Add the ice cream in big scoops - it will resemble a big fluffy cloud. Drop cherries on top of the cloud of ice cream and serve.
